Posts.Content:
Well last night I found a lump.  I thought perhaps since I've been workin out for the past three days it was just sore then I felt it!  I dont know what to think.  I haven't make the call to the Dr. yet so this may take weeks or something.  I'm 42 with a beautiful family.  Is all breast cancer curable?  On one hand I think it's NOT cancer, then I FEEL it and I know in my heart it is.  I'm just afraid and worried.  Will be making that call soon as they 
open this morning.
Posts.Title: JUST FOUND IT
Looks like I am going to have more surgery.

Posts.Content:
Thanks MK - I was here about
 2 years ago and you all helped me with dealing with my mom. Her cancer had spread to the lungs and bone and we lost her 7-6-06. I will make that call just as soon as they 
open. I'm just scared real scared MK.
Posts.Title: JUST FOUND IT

Posts.Content:
Morning Ladies...
Well Alot happened yesterday and it happened very quickly...
I went to see my Dr. and she checked the lump and scheduled me for the mammo...
I got in yesterday at 3:30 for this mammo...
Dr. said on the mammo he did not see anything but he wants to do a biop on this lump...
This lump I'd like to ask about
, maybe one of you out there can help me out...please let me explain...it's a 3x3 (I overheard the Dr say) and it does move...it is NOT squishy...it's rather hard and it's pushing against my skin and rubbin it rather raw...anyhow yes it hurts and it looks like it's bruising and harad as a rock!!!
I know I'm surely not out of the woods on this so I'm still looking for answers...
Dr called me this am said my orders were sent to the Diagnostic Center and they will call me today to set up this biop, she said maybe tomorrow or Monday...
Okay ladies as in your opinion or past history or even posts on here...how am I doing...???...sound okay or should I worry yet...??....I can help anyone in this world and be strong as an Ox...but when it comes to myself I tend to let it go ...to be honest I haven't had a mammo since 2002...and I was scared to death doing that...this is driving me insane...I can't handle my "Own" pressure...sounds silly I know...I tend to get all worked up over nothing...lol...
okay ladies hit me with your best shot here...lol...
Have Faith - Christa
Posts.Title: JUST FOUND IT

Posts.Content:
I'll go in at 9:45 
WISH ME LUCK like everyone else that has already gone thru this - it's going to feel like months until I know
Have Faith 3
Posts.Title: JUST FOUND IT

Posts.Content: I had the biopsy done on Friday do you believe that?  Everything is moving so quickly...!!!...They siad I may find out tomorrow...
